advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
Stampt is a smartphone replacement for “Buy 10, Get 1 free” punch cards. You no longer need to worry about forgetting your cards. Stampt makes it easy to receive all of the rewards you want from your favorite businesses. Use Stampt throughout the United States to earn free sandwiches, coffee, pizza, frozen yogurt, donuts, bagels and more.

Stampt’s nearby feature shows you all of the rewards you can earn at nearby businesses. Tap any business to learn more about that business and to see all of the Stampts you have earned at that business. Stampt is fast and easy to use. All you need to do to earn a Stampt is scan the QR code near the cashier after your purchase. That’s it, you’ve earned a Stampt and on your way to receiving a great reward.

You can keep track of all of the rewards you are close to earning through the “my cards” feature. Once you’ve earned all of the Stampt’s you need for a reward, simply show the cashier and click “tap to redeem”. Congratulations, you’ve just earned a reward and are ready to start earning  another.

Download Stampt today to begin earning great rewards. Please contact us if you have any questions about Stampt at mobivity.com/contact.
releaseNotes: Fixed About Stampt button not working.
